maqras.text: O moyi lyudy, v toy chas, yak ya zaproshuyu vas buty vryatovani, vy zaproshuyete meni do hellfire
Vy zaproshuyete meni shchob buty unappreciative BOHA, ta shchob vstanovyty bilya idoliv Yoho shcho ya ne vyznayu. YA zaproshuyu vas do Mohutni, Forgiver
Nemaye sumnivu shcho shcho vy zaproshuyete meni shchob ne maye bazy u tse svit, ne u U maybutnʹomu, shcho nashomu ostatochnomu vidshkoduvanni musytʹ BOH, ta shcho porushnyky pidpaly hellfire
Deyakyy denʹ vy z·hadayete shcho ya rozpovidayu vam zaraz. YA lyshayu vyrok tsiyeyi materiyi do BOHA; BOH yavlyaye soboyu Seer vsikh lyudey
BOH todi zakhystyv yoho z yikhnʹoho zla zamyshlyaye, v toy chas, yak lyudy Pharaoh zaznaly nayhirshoho retribution
Peklo bude pokazuvatysya yim denʹ ta nich, ta na Dni Resurrection: "Dopustitʹ Pharaoh lyudy u nayhirshyy retribution
Tomu shcho vony sperechayutʹsya u Pekli, poslidovnyky skazhutʹ yikhnim lideram, "My zvychayno buly vashi poslidovnyky, vy mozhete zekonomyty nas budʹ-yaka chastyna tsʹoho Pekla
lidery skazhutʹ, "My ye vsi u tse razom. BOH pryymav rishennya sered lyudey
Tsey u hellfire skazhe okhorontsyam Pekla, "Vyklyk na vashoho Lorda zmenshyty retribution dlya nas, dlya rivnoho odnoho dnya

Vony skazhutʹ, vy ne otrymaly vashykh kur'yeriv kotri dostavyly do vas yasni povidomlennya?" Vony vidpovidyatʹ, "Tak my." Vony skazhutʹ, "Todi blahayutʹ (yak bahato tomu shcho vy bazhayete); blahayuchyy disbelievers zavzhdy marno
Naybilʹsh bezperechno, my damo peremoha nashym kur'yeram ta do tsykh khto vvazhayutʹ, i u tsʹomu sviti i na dni svidky sklykayutʹsya
Na shcho denʹ, vybachennya disbelievers ne budutʹ yim vyhody. Vony zaznaly osudu; vony zaznaly nayhirshoyi doli
My daly Moses kerivnytstvo, ta zroblene Dityam Izrayilya uspadkovuyemo svyate pysannya
(Yikhnya istoriya) ye urok ta reminder dlya tsykh khto volodiyutʹ rozvidkoyu
Tomu, patsiyent, dlya BOZHOYI obitsyanky ye virnyy, ta prosyatʹ forgiveness dlya vashoho hrikha, ta glorify ta khvalyatʹ vashoho Lorda nich ta denʹ

Bezsumnivno, tsey khto sperechayutʹsya proty BOZHYKH vidkryttiv bez dokazu exposing zukhvalistʹ tse - prykhovani vnutrishni yikhni skryni, ta vony ne znayutʹ navitʹ tse. Tomu, shukayutʹ prytulku u BOHU; Vin yavlyaye soboyu Slukhacha, Seer
stvorennya neba ta zemli navitʹ bilʹshe awesome nizh stvorennya lyudsʹke buduchy, ale naybilʹsh lyudy ne znayutʹ
Ne rivnyy yavlyayutʹ soboyu slipyy ta seer. Ne ye tsey khto vvazhayutʹ ta robota righteousness dorivnyuyutʹ do hrishnykiv. Ridko robyty vy berete uvahu
Naybilʹsh zvychayno, Hodyna (Denʹ Vyroku) prybuvaye, pevno pryblyzno tse, ale naybilʹsh lyudy ne vvazhayutʹ
Vash Lord kazhe, "Blahayu Meni, ta ya vidpovidu do vas. Bezsumnivno, tsey khto ye nadto zukhvalyy obozhnyuvaty Meni uviyde Gehenna, forcibly
BOH yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto zamyslyv nichni takym chynom vy mozhete vidpochyty u tse, ta osvitlenomu dni. BOH daruye bahato blahoslovennya na lyudey, ale naybilʹsh lyudy ye ne vdyachni
Takyy BOH vash Lord, Creator vsikh rechey. Nemaye boha krim Vin. Yak vy mohly deviate
Deviating tsey khto disregard BOZHI vidkryttya

BOH yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto nadav habitable zemli dlya vas, ta nebo formidable struktura, ta Vin zamyslyv vas, ta zamyslyly vas dobre. Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto zabezpechuye vas z harnymy umovamy. Takyy BOH vash Lord; Naybilʹsh Exalted BOH, Lord vsesvitu
Vin yavlyaye soboyu Zhyttya; nemaye boha krim Vin. Vy budete obozhnyuvaty Yoho vyklyuchno, prysvyachuyuchy vashu relihiyu absolyutno yomu yedynu. Pokhvalitʹ musytʹ BOH, Lord vsesvitu
